==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|み|そ|yomi=kun}}
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|じゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology 1===
/mi<sub>1</sub>so<sub>1</sub>/ → /miso/. Compound of {{m|ja|三|tr=mi||three}} and {{m|ja|十|tr=so||ten}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/miso/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みそ}}

# [[thirty]]

===Etymology 2===
Compound of {{m|ja|三十|tr=miso||thirty}} and suffix {{m|ja|路|tr=chi}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/misotɕi/|lang=ja}}

====Alternative forms====
* [[三十路]]

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みそち}}

# [[thirty]]
# thirty years of age

=====Derived terms=====
* [[三十]] (misoji)

===Etymology 3===
/misodi/ → /misozi/. From earlier {{m|ja|三十|tr=misochi}}. Final -chi voices in compounding.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/misodʑi/|lang=ja}}

====Alternative forms====
* [[三十路]]

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みそじ|hhira=みそぢ}}

# [[thirty]]
# thirty years of age

===Etymology 4===
/sanzihu/: */sanzipu/ → /sanziɸu/ → */sanziwu/ → /sanziu/ → /sanzyuː/. Compound of {{m|ja|三|tr=san||three}} and {{m|ja|十|tr=jū||ten}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/sandʑuː/|lang=ja}}

# [[thirty]]
